price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߢߊ߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߴߊ߬ ߡߏߦߌߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ، ߊ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߕߊ߬ߓߊ߯ ߞߎ߬ߕߊ߬ ߞߍ߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
